case.title: Calling all MotherFlowers young and old - 36 (Westchester)
case.text: I'm single 36, work for software company, fit, 5'5", brown eyes and hair. Financially independent and workout on daily basis. I am looking for a male between 36 to 50 to be friends and maybe more. It depends if we have chemistry. I have preference for Middle Eastern, Indians and Caucasian men. It's just my taste. No drugs, smoking or drinking. No Disease pls! No drama and/or BS! No married man pls!!! No picture no reply.
